name: Reflector Rhythm Master
description:
Although it is a music game, all elements of the stage fit on one screen.
Every movement is predictable.
And yet, the instantaneous decisions required are like those of an improvised performance.

When the ball overlaps the triple line at the bottom of the stage, it can be bounced by pressing the key corresponding to the lane.
If you fail to push the ball, it will fall and your hearts will be reduced.
However, the next ball will be generated immediately.
the music does not stop or change.
Before all the hearts are gone, The stage is cleared when all the blocks are broken before all the hearts are lost.

A block that only bounces the ball.
Blocks that temporarily accelerate the ball.
Blocks that accelerate the entire song.
A block that splits the ball and other gimmicks.

Created out of love for traditional music games, Enjoy this strange new world.

  • 12 stages
  • 12 original songs with vocal synthesizer
    (No lyrics, so you don't have to choose your language)
  • 3 difficulty levels
  • Automatic and manual correction of sound delay
